mean_cn: n. 净空，净空高度，头上空间
mean_en: the space between the top of your head and a ceiling or roof when you are standing or sitting
word_etyma: head头部 + room空间 → headroom 头上空间，净空高度
short_phrase: four feet of headroom under the bridge
sentence: Be careful going under this bridge - there's only four feet of headroom!
sentence_trans: 穿过这座桥底的时候要注意，它净空高度只有4英尺！
